title: Shocking Fruit Facts You Didnt Know!

tasks.task: Listen to and understand the nutritional content of various fruits.
subtasks: Identify the fruit with the most protein (guava).
Identify the fruit with the least protein (grapes).
Identify the fruit with the most calcium (oranges).
Identify the fruit with the least calcium (pineapple).
Identify the fruit with the most potassium (bananas).
Identify the fruit with the least potassium (blueberries).
Identify the fruit with the most fiber (raspberries).
Identify the fruit with the least fiber (watermelon).

tasks.task: Apply the phrase "If nature don't make it, don't take it" in one's dietary choices.
subtasks: Understand the adage's relevance to healthy eating.
Evaluate the presence of nutrients in natural versus non-natural sources.
